value:
Leave me alone! I'm no good in
a fight, so if you could just let me
find a corner to hide in...

I'm not used to being out of my room
like this. All this fresh air... Bleh!

Hey! Are you...out patrolling the
grounds? Is it because you don't
trust me?! That's it, isn't it!

Do you happen to know any good
spots one might be able to curl up
in and hide? Wanna help me look?

Waahhh! You weren't supposed
to notice me here!
I can improve too, you know.

I'm Bernadetta! You can call me
"Bernie" if you want. Or you can
not call me anything at all...$k$pI...tend to prefer the latter.

♪Hmm... Hm-hm-hmm... ♪
Oh! I didn't know you were there,
$Nu... But...$k$pI did want to tell you, I think I'm
finally getting used to it here. Not...
comfortable or anything, but better.$k$pUntil I start thinking about how I'm
in this different WORLD fighting ALL
SORTS of people...$k$p...Sorry. I got carried away. But you
understand what I'm saying, right?
I'm saying, uh... Thanks!$k$pI feel safer making an effort
knowing that you're watching
my back.$k$pThat said...if you want to take
a break, I'd happily find a corner
to hide in, if one is available...
Go away, I'm busy! No, sorry, I'm really not...
I just want to hide in my room... Th-that's OK, right?
You always hide your face... Good idea!
Life is so hard... Don't you think?
Meeting you is one of the best things that's happened to me...
